user_query: I want to find a gym with state-of-the-art equipment, know the BMI range for my age and height, and get the logo and data of my favorite sports team.

TaskList.description: Search for gyms in the downtown area that have state-of-the-art equipment.
Calculate the BMI range based on the user's age and height.
Retrieve the logo and data of the user's favorite sports team.
